publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3727.1 Robin Harper: Forestryâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-3727) in the name of Sarah Boyack, insert at end "and considers that, to maximise the contribution that forestry can make to addressing climate change challenges, the Scottish Government should work with all forestry interests, with saw mills and the building and construction industries towards the long-term aim of deploying timber frame and massive timber construction techniques as standard practice where possible in future building in Scotland."
